title: Embedding OT-TTF in Word
content:
Hi you all,

I'm trying to get an OT-TTF embedded in Microsoft Office. Is there a way to get it done?  
As far as I get it embeds in PowerPoint (Office 2003 and 2007) but no way to get it embedded in Word (2003 nor 2007).  
FontValidator doesn't report any critical error.  
I could follow a topic in this forum about this issue but there wasn't any final solution-conclusion.

Anybody had these problems and have any light for the path to solve them?  
Many thanks for your help,

Joancarles, BaseLab
author: joanca
